fn.p: All information appearing in the Industry Update was supplied by manufacturers’ press releases and edited for length by the publisher. Publication of information and resources in the Industry Update does not imply AADE or publisher endorsement of products or services.

sec.title: Unifine® Pentips®Plus

bold.italic: The world’s first pen needle with built-in remover!

sec.p: Owen Mumford has launched a unique pen needle in direct response to patients’ and health care professionals’ needs—Unifine® Pentips®Plus.
This innovative pen needle has three primary benefits:

list-item.p: Easy to handle—integrated disposal chamber gives the device built-in grips, making it easy to handle when attaching a new needle.
Easy to remove—simply place the device on a flat surface and easily remove the pen needle from the pen using the built-in remover. The user’s hands never come in contact with the needle.

Easy disposal—the disposal chamber features Safety Click Technology™ that locks the used pen needle away and provides a safe place to dispose of a used needle when a sharps container is not available.

sec.p: For more information and product videos featuring Unifine Pentips Plus, visit www.unifinepentipsplus.com/us.

DiabetesCare.net is a one-stop Internet resource where people with diabetes—and their health care providers—come to learn, explore, ask questions, interact, and share their experiences about living with diabetes. DiabetesCare.net offers free lifestyle tracking tools, a library of healthy recipes and helpful diabetes resource videos, forums, the latest diabetes news, and more!

sec.title: Luvena Prebiotic

p.bold: Restores, relieves, and protects . . . naturally! Without the use of Parabens and Glycerin.

sec.p: Luvena Prebiotic® is a safe and natural lubricant and moisturizer that contains prebiotic ingredients and enzymes proven to help restore a healthy pH to the vagina. Helps eliminate dryness, unpleasant odor, and itchiness.

Luvena PreBiotic is vital to women prone to vaginal problems due to dryness or vaginal fluid change. These changes are gradual and often go unnoticed until they lead to vaginosis, yeast infection, odor, and painful intercourse.
Causes of vaginal dryness/changes include menopause, diabetes, over 500 prescription and over-the-counter medications, douching, and autoimmune disorders.
Any change can alter the correct pH and disrupt the vagina’s natural protective enzymatic action!
From the creators of the biotene brand of dry mouth oral care products (biotene is the registered trademark of GlaxoSmithKline and companies).
